name: pagepersonai-monorepo
description: PagePersonAI - Transform web content with AI-powered personas

scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run --workspace=client dev & npm run --workspace=server dev
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run --workspace=client build && npm run --workspace=server build && npm run --workspace=server start
scripts.build: tsc -b shared && tsc -b server && tsc -b client
scripts.test: npm run --workspace=client test && npm run --workspace=server test
